column2: The Preserver of the Shrines and leader of $SOCIETY|Y$, leading the grand effort of bringing more people into the fold.
Our brothers and our lord may have betrayed the ancestors, but we will remain strong. A day will come when we will emerge again like a phoenix, once again to remind the lesser peoples of their place.
In secret, Imperialists in this province have stockpiled weapons and supplies in wait for the great uprising against the weaklings who hold power.

When all others have abandoned our most ancient and sacred traditions, this society will continue to uphold them. Constant work must be done to maintain the countless shrines scattered across the ancestral lands of our ancestors, to show the Spirits that not all have forgotten their obligations.
The Preserver of the Shrines and leader of $SOCIETY|Y$, leading the grand effort of bringing more people into the fold.
column3: Le grand prêtre de $SOCIETY|Y$ dirige l'effort mondial visant à rassembler davantage de personnes en son sein.

column2: Ba Sing Se's culture and heritage is more than any individual, movement or even the Earth Kingdom. Never has this city yielded to intruders, and those who work to preserve it's glory will never falter.

column2: The populace of Omashu stood long and proud against many invaders, even persevering after the great city fell to Chin the Conqueror. The people of the two tribes of Oma and Shu united countless years ago will not give up their traditions and identity easily.
The Secretariat and leader of the $SOCIETY|Y$, leading the grand effort of bringing more people into the fold.

column2: The righteous descendants of Jin Wei will never yield their ancestors honour to the dishonourable tribe of Wei Jin. One day, the tribe of Jin Wei will emerge victorious!

column2: As the ages pass, Humanity grows more vain and arrogant. They no longer leave offerings for the Spirits, and simply blunder their way through the sacred rivers, overcoming the Great Serpents that live there by force. If it takes working in the shadows, then the Serpent Guard will do so to preserve these majestic creatures.

column2: Though foreigners rule here, the old ways and traditions of the land shall not be forgotten. Those who still practise them will continue to wander paths known to no others.

column2: While outsiders may look upon the practise as a sham, the ability of the seers to divine the future is without a doubt a reality. Together, we may work together in order to protect and preserve this knowledge.

column2: We must fulfil the vision spoken of by the Great Uniter, bringing the vast lands of the old Earth Kingdom under a single, absolute rule. One that can ensure justice, stability and security for all.

column2: While the loss of Chin the Great struck a fatal blow to his empire, there are still many who remain who wish to recreate it's majesty. Working in the shadows, they gather strength, waiting for the time to recreate Chin's conquests.
General and leader of $SOCIETY|Y$, leading the grand effort of bringing more people into the fold.

column2: Even in her time, the beliefs and teachings of Avatar Kyoshi were highly contentious among the Earth Kingdom. There are some who will always look to stamp out such beliefs, but there are those also who are willing to fight to preserve them.
Commander and leader of the $SOCIETY|Y$, leading the grand effort of bringing more people into the fold.

column2: The traditions of the Earth Kingdom have spanned known history, and never has the rule of our beloved majesty been subverted. The Loyalists stand only for one thing, and that is the continued advancement of the Monarchy.
Secretariat and leader of $SOCIETY|Y$, leading the grand effort of bringing more people into the fold.

column2: For so long have our clans lived free among the sands of the Si Wong. No foreign beliefs or culture would ever prosper out in such harsh terrain, and thus, such ideas much be driven from these lands if the clans are to survive.
Chieftain and leader of $SOCIETY|Y$, leading the grand effort of bringing more people into the fold.

column2: Though the nation may have abandoned the ways of the Spirits, and misguided lords may rewrite our history, those who stand against them will work in the shadows to preserve both our knowledge of the Spirits and the past.

column2: While the traitors and cowards have undermined our great nation, the loyal few continue to fight to restore a proper Fire Lord to the throne, one who is no puppet of foreigners or the Avatar, one who will once again resume the pursuit of the Fire Nation's ultimate destiny.
General of the Loyalists, Protector of the Nation and leader of the $SOCIETY|Y$, leading the grand effort of bringing more people into the fold.

column2: The ways of the Bhanti and the mainstream beliefs of the Fire Isles have long had great differences. What the rest of the Isles believe however, has always been of little concern.

column2: It has been a long time since our flames burned bright, but the Sun Warriors continue to endure to this day. Though it may take endless toil in the shadows, the Keepers of the Flame will preserve the old ways, and protect the old masters from outsiders who would seek to hunt them.

column2: Long as the Foggy Swamp slept undisturbed, but now the tribes that have dwelt there for generations are persecuted by these outsider beliefs. We must work to remove them from our ancestral land.
